ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers

Class TooltipStyleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.Controller
      • ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.TooltipStyleController

  • public class TooltipStyleController
extends Controller
    This class is responsible for controlling access to the tool tip style.
    Author:
    Eric Marinier
